conclusion: Charges are 2q and -q; side length of cube is L; midpoint O is midpoint of line connecting charges.
Distance from each charge to O is L/2.
Electric field due to 2q at O is 8kq/L^2.
Electric field due to -q at O is 4kq/L^2.
Total electric field at O is 12kq/L^2.
Distance from each charge to point A is Lâˆš3.
Electric field due to 2q at A is 2kq/3L^2.
Electric field due to -q at A is kq/3L^2.
Total electric field at A is kq/L^2.
Final answer: The magnitude of the electric field strength at point A is E/12.
